title: Prey (2006) playthrough
description: Played through all of the 2006 Prey today. Pretty sweet game! Had some things that were better than Quake 4 and Doom 3, and I really liked the portals and weird mario galaxy style stuff that would happen occasionally. Purely fun game; only issue I have is that it might be too easy with the ability to just respawn right into combat if you die.
